entities.description: Indicates misuse of tranquilizers in the past year among initial users.
The year or period referenced in the past year misuse of tranquilizers, can range from 2021 to 2022.
The first month when tranquilizers were misused for past year initiates.
Indicates if tranquilizers were used in the past 30 days without a doctor's direction.
The frequency of tranquilizer use in the past 30 days without a doctor's direction.
Respondent's estimate of the days they used tranquilizers without a doctor's direction in the past 30 days.

relationships.description: Past year misuse of tranquilizers is referenced by a specific year or period.
Past year misuse of tranquilizers includes the first month it was misused.
The survey includes a question about tranquilizer use in the past 30 days without a doctor's direction.
The misuse of tranquilizers in the past 30 days is associated with a frequency.
The misuse of tranquilizers in the past 30 days includes an estimate of days used.
